trans-unit.source: Implements the `GenerateDeploymentManifest` task.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den `GenerateDeploymentManifest` oppgaven.

trans-unit.source: Use the `GenerateDeploymentManifest` element in the project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av `GenerateDeploymentManifest` elementet i prosjektfilen til å opprette og kjøre denne oppgaven.

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [GenerateDeploymentManifest Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For bruk og parametere informasjon, se [GenerateDeploymentManifest oppgaven](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether an icon is created on the desktop during ClickOnce application installation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om et ikon opprettes på skrivebordet under ClickOnce installasjonen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an icon is created on the desktop during installation; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis et ikon opprettes på skrivebordet under installasjonen. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> ellers.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the update location for the application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Oppdateringsplasseringen for programmet.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, no update location is defined for the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen ikke er angitt, er ingen oppdateringsplassering definert for applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A> property is `true`, an update location must be specified.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid hvis den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A>egenskapen `true`, en oppdateringsplassering må angis.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or UNC path.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien må være en fullstendig URL-adresse eller UNC-bane.

trans-unit.source: The update location for the application.
trans-unit.target: Oppdateringsplasseringen for programmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the application should be run automatically when it is opened through a URL.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som angir om programmet bør kjøres automatisk når den åpnes via en URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `false`.

trans-unit.source: This property applies only when the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare når den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A>egenskapsverdi `true`.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the application can only be started from the **Start** menu; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis programmet kan bare startes fra den **Start** menyen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the Web page that is displayed in dialog boxes during ClickOnce installations.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adresse for nettside som vises i dialogbokser under ClickOnce installasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a Web page to be displayed in dialog boxes that are displayed during ClickOnce installations.
trans-unit.target: Angir en nettside som skal vises i dialogbokser som vises under ClickOnce installasjoner.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the URL of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer URL-adresse for en webside.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean that indicates whether the application is an installed application or an online-only application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som angir om programmet er en installert program eller en online-programmet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the application is to be installed on the local computer and can be removed by using the **Add or Remove Programs** dialog box; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the application is for online use from a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis programmet skal installeres på den lokale datamaskinen, og kan fjernes via den **Legg til eller fjern programmer** dialogboksen. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis programmet er tilkoblet Bruk fra en webside.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the .deploy file name extension mapping is used.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som angir om den .deploy tilordningen av filtype brukes.

trans-unit.source: Use this option for Web server security to limit the number of file name extensions that must be unblocked to enable [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application deployment.
trans-unit.target: Bruk dette alternativet for sikkerhet for Web-server til å begrense antall filtyper som må være opphevet for å aktivere [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programdistribusjon.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if every program file is published with a .deploy file name extension; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis alle programfilen er publisert med .deploy filtype. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the user can skip the update.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som angir om brukeren kan hoppe over oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: If a user has a version that is earlier than the minimum requirement, he cannot skip the update.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en bruker har en versjon som er eldre enn minstekravet, kan ikke han hoppe over oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: This input only applies when the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Inndataene gjelder bare når verdien for den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can skip the update; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren kan hoppe over oppdateringen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på programmet.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, the name is inferred from the identity of the generated manifest.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen ikke er angitt, utledes navnet fra identiteten til genererte manifestet.

trans-unit.source: This name is used for the shortcut name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in the **Add or Remove Programs** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Dette navnet brukes for snarveinavnet på den **Start** menyen og er en del av navnet som vises i den **Legg til eller fjern programmer** dialogboksen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the application.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på programmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the publisher of the application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir utgiveren av programmet.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified, the name is inferred from the registered user, or the identity of the generated manifest.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen ikke er angitt, utledes navnet fra den registrerte brukeren eller identiteten til genererte manifestet.

trans-unit.source: This name is used for the folder name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in the **Uninstall or change a program** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Dette navnet brukes for mappenavnet på den **Start** menyen og er en del av navnet som vises i den **Avinstaller eller endre et program** dialogboksen.

trans-unit.source: The publisher of the application.
trans-unit.target: Utgiveren av programmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the folder on the **Start** menu where the application is located after ClickOnce deployment.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på mappen på den **Start** menyen der programmet finnes etter ClickOnce-distribusjonen.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of a **Start** menu folder.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer navnet på en **Start** -mappe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the link that appears in the **Uninstall or change a program** dialog box for the application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir du koblingen som vises i den **Avinstaller eller endre et program** dialogboksen for programmet.

trans-unit.source: The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or UNC path.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien må være en fullstendig URL-adresse eller UNC-bane.

trans-unit.source: The link that appears in the **Uninstall or change a program** dialog box for the application.
trans-unit.target: Koblingen som vises i den **Avinstaller eller endre et program** dialogboksen for programmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether URL query-string parameters should be made available to the application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som angir om URL-spørringsstrengen parameterne skal gjøres tilgjengelig for programmet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`, which indicates that parameters will not be available to the application.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `false`, noe som angir at parametere ikke tilgjengelig for programmet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if URL query-string parameters should be made available to the application; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis URL-adressen spørringsstrengen parametere må gjøres tilgjengelig for programmet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the application is enabled for updates.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som angir om programmet er aktivert for oppdateringer.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `false`.

trans-unit.source: This property only applies when the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare når verdien for den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the application is enabled for updates; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis programmet er aktivert for oppdateringene. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the update interval for the application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir oppdateringsintervallet for programmet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is zero.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er null.

trans-unit.source: This property only applies when the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare når verdiene i den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A>og <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A>er begge `true`.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: The update interval for the application.
trans-unit.target: Oppdateringsintervall for programmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether updates should be checked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som angir om oppdateringer skal kontrolleres.

trans-unit.source: Updates can be checked before the application is started (in the foreground), or when the application is running (in the background).
trans-unit.target: Oppdateringer kan kontrolleres før applikasjonen startes (i forgrunnen), eller når programmet kjører (i bakgrunnen).

trans-unit.source: This property can have the following values: - `Foreground` (before the application is started) - `Background` (when the application is running) The default value is `Background`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ha følgende verdier:- `Foreground` (før applikasjonen startes)- `Background` (når programmet kjører) standardverdien er `Background`.

trans-unit.source: This property only applies when the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare når verdiene i den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A>og <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A>er begge `true`.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if updates should be checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis oppdateringer skal kontrolleres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time unit for the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateInterval*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tidsenheten for den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateInterval*>egenskapen.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateInterval*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter can have the following values: - `Hours` - `Days` - `Weeks` This property only applies when the values of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A> properties are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren kan ha følgende verdier:- `Hours` - `Days` - `Weeks` denne egenskapen gjelder bare når verdiene i den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A>og <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A>er begge `true`.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateEnabled%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: The time unit for the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateInterval*> property.
trans-unit.target: Tidsenheten for den <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateInterval*>egenskapen.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateDeploymentManifest.UpdateInterval*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
